
### exercise (2)  {.smaller}


* 2 set, 3-way cache, 4 byte blocks
* access pattern: 

   * 0x0, 0x1000, 0x4, 0x1004, 0x0, 0x1008, 0x4, 0x100C,
   * 0x0, 0x1010, 0x4, 0x1014, 0x0, 0x1018, 0x4, 0x101C,

* how does each do? 

   * LRU
   * FIFO
   * random
